name: Jen Mueller
text: Always act like you're an inconvenience, never answer the phone, look to be understaffed at all times. I've not had a good experience here in a loooong time.

name: Jason Peterson
text: Absolute garbage!  Waited over 30 minutes for curb side pickup.  After making the decision to go into the restaurant, was told the delivery guy took it, and would take another 30 minutes to make another.  The entire staff needs to be replaced!

name: Kris Cherry
text: Went online to place an order for delivery, it was going to be over and hour.  I live 2 minutes away.    Service is not the greatest. Orders have been wrong.  Hot the brownie on a particular order and it tasted old and stale.  This location is always out of product.   Employees are not very customer oriented.

name: Christina Thomas
text: We stopped today at the one in Springhill Louisiana. There was NO one there eating in the dining area. We waited several minutes at the ordering counter with a girl not 5 feet from us. She never said anything til we asked if anyone worked …More

name: Amanda T.
text: This place is understaffed and the workers are doing their best. People need to act like they have some home training and stop being rude to food service workers. It's a fast food pizza chain that pays their workers minimum wage. Are you expecting five star service, princess?

name: Richard Norcross
text: Always slow service. The phone is always ringing and no one will ever answer it. I ordered two large pizzas and one came 20 minutes before the other. It's like the staff don't care if you're inside or are not there at all. they need new management.

name: Mitchell Garrett
text: 0 stars. This is not the first time i've tried to order from Springhill Pizza Hut only to be met with terrible service and sub par / cold food. Food was over an hour late tonight and when it finally arrived it was so smashed that i sent it back and asked for a refund. We need a better option.

text: Despite earlier reviews from customers, places like Pizza Hut have a good turn around rate on employees. So chances are the people that made earlier experiences bad, most likely are no longer employed there. I went with my son and husband …More
